docs.summary:
The wix-crm-backend module contains functionality for working with
 [your site's invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Invoices API, import `wixCrm` from the `wix-crm-backend` module:

params.name: createInvoiceRequest
params.doc: The data used to create an invoice.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID of the created invoice.

description: The `createInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created invoice's
ID when the invoice is created.

params.name: id
params.doc: The ID of the invoice to delete.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - When the invoice is deleted?
Rejected - Error message.

description: The `deleteInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the invoice with the specified ID is deleted.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the invoice to get.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The invoice with the given ID.

docs.summary: Gets an existing invoice by ID.
description: The `getInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the invoice

params.name: updateInvoiceRequest
params.doc: The data used to update an invoice.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID of the updated invoice.

description: The `updateInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the updated invoice's
ID when the invoice is updated.

docs.summary: An object that contains information needed to create invoice.

members.name: data
members.doc: Invoice fields used to create the invoice.

docs.summary: An object that contains invoice information.

members.name: payments
members.doc: List of payments already received from the customer.

members.name: taxes
members.doc: List of taxes calculated based on the line items.

docs.summary: An object that contains invoice date information.

members.name: issueDate
members.doc: Invoice issue date as ISO String.

members.name: dueDate
members.doc: Invoice due date as ISO String.

members.name: timeZoneCode
members.doc: Invoice dates time zone code. Send when creating a new invoice.

docs.summary: An object that contains dynamic total information.
An object that contains Invoice information.

members.name: payments
members.doc: List of payments already received from the client.

docs.summary: An object that contains payment information.

members.name: type
members.doc: Payment type, describing how the payment was made.

docs.summary: An object that contains information needed to update an invoice.

members.name: data
members.doc: Invoice fields used to create the invoice.
